ca.ubc.cs.beta.smac.state
Interface StateFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
LegacyStateFactory
public interface StateFactory

Factory for getting objects related to state. The semantics of the id string are up to individual implementations. In theory clients should have the property that the id something is saved with can be used to retrieve it. But I suppose this might be too strong. Primarily the user should be informed of the state being saved, and it should be clear (like a filename), how to use that id to get it back.

Author:
seramage
